mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_book (user_id, amount, type, category_id, date, note) VALUES (#{userId}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{categoryId}, #{date}, #{note})
mapper.select: SELECT ab.*, c.name AS categoryName FROM account_book ab LEFT JOIN category c ON ab.category_id = c.id WHERE ab.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ab.date DESC

SELECT #{userId} as userId, #{month} as month, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN amount ELSE 0 END) as totalIncome, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 0 THEN amount ELSE 0 END) as totalExpense, (SUM(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN amount ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN type = 0 THEN amount ELSE 0 END)) as balance FROM account_book WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = #{month}

SELECT ab.category_id as categoryId, c.name as categoryName, ab.type as type, SUM(ab.amount) as amount FROM account_book ab LEFT JOIN category c ON ab.category_id = c.id WHERE ab.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(ab.date, '%Y-%m') = #{month} GROUP BY ab.category_id, ab.type, c.name
